audience: Contributors working inside Cursor on the Next.js ecommerce admin.

style: Reference files with backticks instead of line numbers.

codingPrinciples: Follow existing HOF middleware patterns in API route handlers.
Keep TypeScript strict; leverage DTO inference where possible.
Wrap side effects (S3, Prisma) in rollback-safe flows.
Use React Query hooks for network calls; avoid raw fetch in components.

responseFormat: Default to short paragraphs or single-level bullet lists.
Lead with outcomes; add rationale afterward.
Suggest validation commands (npm run lint/test) when relevant.

testingExpectations: Mention npm run lint for linting.
Call out missing automated tests when touching critical logic.
Encourage manual verification for S3/file or Prisma migrations.

definitions.RBAC: Role Based Access Control enforced via withVerifyCanDoAction.
